pullrequest.title: copy and paste added to edit menu.

content.raw: I'll approve this but also cc @spaepcke to see what she thinks about the order of the actions in the Edit menu. Usually Undo/Redo are first in the list, followed by Copy/Paste, but this PR has Copy/Paste at the bottom of the list.
content.html: I'll approve this but also cc @spaepcke to see what she thinks about the order of the actions in the Edit menu. Usually Undo/Redo are first in the list, followed by Copy/Paste, but this PR has Copy/Paste at the bottom of the list.
